refreshTokenRevokedEventExchange.name: auth-server.security-tokens.api.1.refresh-token-revoked-event
refreshTokenRevokedEventExchange.description: This exchange is used to publish the following event: RefreshTokenRevokedEvent

refreshTokenInvalidatedEventExchange.name: auth-server.security-tokens.api.1.refresh-token-invalidated-event
refreshTokenInvalidatedEventExchange.description: This exchange is used to publish the following event: RefreshTokenInvalidatedEvent

userRolesChangedEventQueue.name: auth-server.security-tokens.inbound.1.user-roles-changed-event-queue
userRolesChangedEventQueue.description: This queue is used to receive user roles changed event messages for invalidating their tokens.

passwordChangedEventQueue.name: auth-server.security-tokens.inbound.1.password-changed-event-queue
passwordChangedEventQueue.description: This queue is used to receive user password changed event messages for revoking their tokens.
